review: This product is acceptable but not amazing. I was expecting a lot more speed with the dual core chip but it still seamed slower than the Roku stick. The menu software is not the easiest to navigate. The bar menu on the side seems confusing to get to other popular apps such as netflix, crackle, etc. Also, I didn't understand why I have to have this extra 2 inch cable connected between the stick and the TV for "best performance" as Amazon recommends. Isn't that that point of having a stick? No extra cable? Also, my TV works great to power the Roku stick from the USB port so I don't have to have a AC cable connected. With the Fire Stick it notified me that my USB port was not an acceptable power source for the fire stick. That was another let down.  The Roku stick is still my favorite for ease of use and functionality.
